category: Herbs that Dispel Wind and Dampness

action.primary: Dispels Wind, resolves Dampness, disperses swelling and regulates menstruation

indications: Swollen and sore throat, malaria, trauma, arthralgia, headache, abdominal pain, toothache

contraindications: Do not take with sour food.

notes: This herb is effective for Wind-Cold-Dampness, severe migratory Arthralgia and cold limbs
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
For subcutaneous nodules and laryngeal infection, remove the outer layer and decoct.
This herb relieves pain and Stasis.
